programme.desc: As Genevieve crosses into New Mexico on Route 66, what started as a classic road trip begins to turn into a journey to understanding her roots.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Quest Hoshiarpur
programme.desc: The cuisine of Punjab is rich in flavour because it is farm-to-fork and still employs traditional cooking methods such as cooking in a charcoal oven.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 City Breaks Singapore
programme.desc: Cutting-edge architecture, world-class restaurants, high-end retail, fantastical theme parks, electric nightlife – Singapore is a playground for hedonists and jetsetters. With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the city. As she masters the art of the Singapore Sling, finds hidden mangrove kayaking spots and tucks into Michelin star street food, the Lion City reveals its many sides to her in the span of a weekend.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Great World Hotels Amansara 2, Cambodia
programme.desc: Sukhmani is on a break in Cambodia, where she gets to stay at a resort, which used to be the royal guest house.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Viajar Mexico, Monterrey
programme.desc: Charlie takes viewers to some of the towns in Mexico that are celebrated for preserving the essence of the country: ‘Pueblo Magicos’. One such town is Monterrey, where he heads straight to a spectacular canyon, where the locals are known to have ‘beer and barbecue’ picnics. Following this, he explores another picturesque attraction nearby called the Bustamante caves, where he can’t help but gawk at the age-old stalactite and stalagmite formations.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 City Breaks Singapore
programme.desc: Cutting-edge architecture, world-class restaurants, high-end retail, fantastical theme parks, electric nightlife – Singapore is a playground for hedonists and jetsetters. With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the city. As she masters the art of the Singapore Sling, finds hidden mangrove kayaking spots and tucks into Michelin star street food, the Lion City reveals its many sides to her in the span of a weekend.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Route 66 Northern Arizona, USA (PT)
programme.desc: As Genevieve’s epic road trip leads her to Arizona’s raw, untamed terrain, the state begins to reveal its surreal natural wonders to her.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Quest Lucknow 1
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets a Nawab in Lucknow, who shows her how to make Gosht Mawazad, a decadent Awadhi dish with mutton and dry fruits.

programme.title: City Breaks Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: From famous landmarks like Prague Castle to offbeat attractions like the Strahov Monastery Brewery, Catriona Strachan discovers different sides of Prague.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E53 Xp Guide Tel Aviv
programme.desc: Israel's art scene, which has been overlooked by the art world for years, is now on the rise.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Viajar Mexico, Santiago
programme.desc: Charlie is about to have a lot of fun in Santiago: it doesn’t get more exciting than glamping in cabañas at the Monterrey Cumbres National Park... or so he believes, until he participates in a traditional healing ceremony that moves him to tears, and makes him see that the most memorable journeys are the ones you take within yourself.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Off The Grid Zanskar, India
programme.desc: On reaching Zanskar, Alex visits Karsha Monastery, the largest one in Zanskar. She ends her stay after exploring the Sani Kanika Monastery, built in 17th century and the stupa.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Route 66 Arizona, USA
programme.desc: The geological attractions of Arizona make Genevieve want to linger on a bit more in the state and veer off Route 66.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Lucknow 2
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets the descendants of the royal families of Hyderabad and Lucknow, and they tell her about the culture and cuisine of both kingdoms.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 World Spas Spa Village Resort, Indonesia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries spa treatments inspired by ancient Balinese healing remedies at the Spa Village Resort in Tembok, Bali.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Xp Guide Seychelles
programme.desc: On an island hopping adventure in the Seychelles, Freishia discovers that each island has something unique to offer.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Viajar Mexico, Cuatro Cienegas
programme.desc: In Cuatro Ciénegas, Charlie uncovers the wonders of the destination, from a beach in the desert to an abandoned marble mine, which doubles up as a stage for open-air performances of traditional Mexican dances. It's his encounter with the first living beings on Earth, however, that leaves him in awe of the power of nature and the secrets it holds.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Off The Grid Srinagar, India
programme.desc: Alex is in Srinagar putting up on a houseboat. She explores the Dal lake, tries Kashmiri Tea, and ends her day with a traditional Kashmiri platter – Wazwan.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Route 66 Illinois, USA
programme.desc: Genevieve’s journey along the legendary Route 66 begins in Chicago, where towering skyscrapers and city streets give way to the open road.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Quest Delhi 1
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Xplore Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Egypt Cairo
programme.desc: Cairo, the sprawling and impressive Egyptian capital, has a rich history that goes beyond books and continues to the present day.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E51 Backpack Baku, Azerbaijan
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Viajar Mexico, Tlaquepaque
programme.desc: On a map of Mexico, Tlaquepaque looks like just another suburb of Guadalajara. Charlie knows, however, that there is more to this town than meets the eye. This colonial town, dating back to Hispanic times, is now a trendy neighborhood in the region, famed for its food, crafts and Mariachi. The highlight of Charlie’s visit, though, is getting to be a part of making a traditional candy that evokes nostalgia for him.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Off The Grid Tsomoriri, India
programme.desc: Alexandra starts her journey from Tsomoriri where on the way she stops at Baralacha Pass. Later she visits Korzok village, interacts with locals and dresses up in a traditional Ladakhi attire.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Route 66 Missouri, USA
programme.desc: Crossing from Illinois into Missouri, Genevieve begins to peel back layers of the country’s history and the golden age of Route 66.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quest Delhi 2, India
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Xplore Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Egypt Aswan
programme.desc: Seep visits the colorful Nubian villages on the west bank of the Nile, treasures of one of Africa's oldest and richest cultures.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E52 Backpack Ganja, Azerbaijan
programme.desc: Azerbaijan has many natural wonders, which could amaze a traveler. From physical mud volcanoes to striking rock formations, Sabrina Chakici witnesses a few of them at Gobustan National Park. Following this, she reaches the city of Ganja, where she uncovers the history at spectacular places such as Heyder Aliyev Park, Mausoleum Imamzadeh, Juma Mosque and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Viajar Mexico, Tequila
programme.desc: Any bona fide Mexican knows that the real proverb is ‘when life gives you lemons, grab the salt and the tequila!’ Charlie’s journey across his homeland brings him to the birthplace of the iconic Mexican spirit to understand what makes it irresistible. Enticed by the drink, however, will he be able to uncover its secrets, or will he end up succumbing to its spell?

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Off The Grid Leh. India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores the rugged region of Leh, visiting Thiksey Monastery, Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa. Later she sets out for a five hour drive to the picturesque Pangong Lake and stays in the tent.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Quest Delhi 3
programme.desc: Parathas may have originated in Peshawar but they have now become one of the most popular dishes

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E53 Backpack Sheki, Azerbaijan
programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Viajar Mexico, Bernal
programme.desc: As Charlie’s adventures in Mexico continue, he introduces viewers to some of the country’s lesser-explored cultural gems. From the towering Peña de Bernal monolith that dominates the picturesque town of Bernal, to the rolling vineyards of the Queretaro wine region, and the intricate copper art of Santa Clara del Cobre, Charlie dives headfirst into the rich history and traditions of the offbeat destinations in Mexico.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Route 66 Kansas, USA
programme.desc: Cruising along the legendary Route 66, Genevieve rolls into Kansas, home to the shortest stretch of the highway.

programme.title: Xplore Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Egypt Luxor
programme.desc: Seep visits Luxor, where she is impressed by the magnificent monuments that have survived from Thebes, the capital of ancient Egypt.

programme.desc: A 106 feet Buddha statue mesmerizes Alex as she explores Diskit Monastery in Nubra Valley. She tries the traditional ladakhi food and explores Leh city, by visiting Gurdwara Pathar Sahib and a school.

programme.desc: Explore Honolulu, one of surfing’s most historic spots. On Oahu’s other side from the North Shore, 'Town' offers perfect waves and rich Hawaiian heritage. Don’t miss the adventure!

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Homemade, human-powered flying machines take to the skies in Red Bull Flugtag Portland. Daring teams compete, thrilling 80,000 spectators with their creative and bold attempts to fly.

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Teams create homemade flying machines inspired by local food, festivals, and traditions. Watch as they bring these fun, unique designs to life!

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Varna, Bulgaria’s summer capital, hosts Red Bull Flugtag, where teams launch homemade flying machines from a 6m runway. Thousands of fans cheer as they soar into the Black Sea!

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: 50 teams race to keep their crazy homemade flying machines in the air over Lake Zurich for as long as possible. Who will succeed?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Brave teams race to keep their crazy homemade flying machines in the air over the Ohio River in Louisville, USA. Who will stay flying the longest?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: A strong headwind tests homemade flying machines as teams push their skills to the limit, battling both the weather and gravity. Can they make it fly?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Teams build crazy homemade flying machines, from Tim Burton-inspired saucers to exploding volcanoes, all trying to stay in the air over Victoria Harbour in Hong Kong. Who will stay flying the longest?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The 2022 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Melbourne, Australia brings wild homemade racers, crashes, laughs, and fierce competition as teams race for the win in this high-speed, creative showdown.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E04 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The Red Bull Soapbox Race 2023 in Jordan challenges creative teams and their handmade cars on a wild track in Amman’s hills. With twists, turns and crashes, it’s a colourful race full of fun!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: Join the action at the Red Bull Soapbox Race 2023 in Switzerland, where teams race homemade cars through tricky turns, blending creativity, speed, and a few crashes.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E03 Red Bull Soapbox 2023 – Norway
programme.desc: Teams bring their inventive, homemade racers to a wild Red Bull Soapbox Race in Norway, facing steep hills and sharp turns in a thrilling showdown of speed, creativity and spills.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S12 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The Red Bull Soapbox Race 2024 in Hyderabad, India, brings chaos as teams race down a tough, obstacle-filled track. Watch as gravity-powered cars race, flip, and soar!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S12 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The Red Bull Soapbox Race 2024 in London features 59 teams racing down a tough course at Alexandra Palace. They fight to keep their creative, gravity-powered vehicles in one piece.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The judges are waiting to see incredible creativity and speed as racers race their homemade soapbox cars in Iowa, USA. Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: The funny race with no engines and lots of obstacles. Have the teams built their homemade soapboxes well enough to reach the finish line, or will the course stop them?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E03 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: Fearless teams race through tough obstacles in their engineless machines at the Red Bull Soapbox Race 2022 in Spa, Belgium. Don’t miss the excitement!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E06 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: Who will win in today’s gravity-powered race? The answer lies in Toulouse! May the pink city inspire strength and courage in all the brave participants. Don't miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S10 : E05 Red Bull Soapbox
programme.desc: A churro-powered race heats up the steep roads of Madrid! Who will take the win, and who will crash into haystacks while the crowd cheers? Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The wildest race on wheels hits Brazil! Brave teams race homemade cars on a tough track. Fast, fun, and full of surprises—watch it all unfold!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The wildest race on wheels hits Finland! Teams race homemade soapbox cars in Red Bull Soapbox Race 2019. Fast, fun, and full of action. Watch it all unfold!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race hits Kaunas, Lithuania! Watch teams race their funny, motorless cars and have the time of their lives. Don’t miss the fun and laughs in this exciting event!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race is back in Dallas, Texas! Watch brave teams race their homemade soapbox cars down a wild and funny course. Don’t miss the thrills and laughs in this exciting event!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: The 2019 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Tokyo takes creativity to new heights! Watch racers speed down a tough, obstacle-filled course in this exciting and wild race. Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Creative and daring teams from the British Isles race to Cork, Ireland for the Red Bull Soapbox Race. Watch them speed down the course in this wild, action-packed event!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Thousands of frenzied fans swarm to Mumbai, India, to watch brave soapbox racers compete in the Red Bull Soapbox Race.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: The Andes mountains set the scene for the Red Bull Soapbox Race in Santiago, Chile. Watch brave teams race through a tough course full of obstacles and sharp turns, who will be the fastest?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: With 20 years of action, the Red Bull Soapbox Race is full of amazing moments. Relive the best highlights of this wild and creative race right here! Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: TUDOR Nazaré Big Wave Challenge 2024 Highlights

programme.desc: After an intense day of competition in Portugal, the WSL team recaps the TUDOR Nazaré Big Wave Challenge. From big wins to wild wipeouts, catch all the highlights!

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Cancun P2 Highlights

programme.title: For Reals

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 For Reals

programme.title: The Next Centimeter

programme.title: Marc Márquez – All In

programme.desc: Le plus gros challenge de Marc Márquez après une énorme blessure ? Redevenir lui-même. Il quitte donc Cervera, où il a toujours vécu, et déménage à Madrid.

programme.title: Marc Márquez – All In
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Marc Márquez – All In
programme.desc: Marc’s unique riding style has earned millions of fans but also caused conflicts with other riders. His brother Álex has seen Marc’s talent and ambition up close - now, he shares his story.

programme.title: Marc Márquez – All In
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Campeão
programme.desc: Marc lembra do início de sua carreira na MotoGP e encontra o homem que era o seu ídolo naquela época: Valentino Rossi. Foi uma longa jornada desde então, e o seu grande ídolo tornou-se seu grande rival.

programme.title: Red Bull TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull TV
programme.desc: Watch the Best of Red Bull TV anywhere, anytime. Tune In to our curated 24/7 stream!

programme.title: Marc Márquez – All In

programme.title: Marc Márquez – All In
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Marc Márquez – All In
programme.desc: Marc returns to racing strong and finishes among the top in the final races. He reflects on a year of tough decisions that shaped his journey back to the track.

programme.title: The Art of Flight

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - FWQ Challenger Silvretta Montafon - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: For the first time, Silvretta Montafon will be part of the Freeride World Tour Challenger Series, making it a crucial contest for the world's best qualifier riders who want to qualify for the Freeride World Tour 2026.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 16

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup & GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Dakhla (MAR)
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup and the GWA Wingfoil World Cup in Dakhla, Morocco, bring together the best kite surfers and wingfoilers in the world. The riders show off their technical skills and innovation in the wave riding disciplines.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - 52min HL (Sailing, Mitte Februar) – International + DACH
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe wants to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean protection during the circumnavigation. By sailing around the world, the Vendée Globe sailors are drawing attention to the fragility of our oceans.

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Men Highlights
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP TwinTip Men Highlights

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 16

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Chasing Dreams
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - 52min HL (Sailing, Mitte Februar) – International + DACH
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe wants to use the media impact of the event to raise public awareness of ocean protection during the circumnavigation. By sailing around the world, the Vendée Globe sailors are drawing attention to the fragility of our oceans.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Prologue
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cape Epic 2025
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the world's most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 1

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Transcordilleras

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E11 Stage 11 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E12 Stage 12 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E13 Stage 13 - SCL Cyprus 2023
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia

programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the world's top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 K1 WGP Opening Round Osaka 2006
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2006 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 98 Rotterdam
programme.desc: GLORY 98 features the highly anticipated return of Jamal Ben Saddik (36-9, 29 KO) against the Estonian powerhouse Uku Jürjendal (20-9, 16 KO). In the co-main event of the evening, GLORY Welterweight World Champion Chico Kwasi (43-5-1, 23 KO) is set to defend his title against number two ranked welterweight Teodor Hristov (18-3, 7 KO). Meanwhile, two of 2024’s best prospects will clash as Cem Caceres (18-1, 14 KO) faces Mory Kromah (31-2-1, 18 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY 17 Los Angeles
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the world's top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 K1 WGP Opening Round Osaka 2006
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2006 Final.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E74 K1 WGP Tokyo FINAL 2006
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion for 2006.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 GLORY 20 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: Saulo Cavalari takes on Artem Vakhitov in the headlining bout at GLORY 20 Dubai, Superfight Series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 GLORY 20 Dubai
programme.desc: This event featured two world title fights for the Glory Lightweight Championship of Robin van Roosmalen vs. Andy Ristie as headliner and inaugural Glory Featherweight Championship of Gabriel Varga vs. Mosab Amrani as co-headliner. Also this event featured 4-Man Middleweight Contender Tournament to earn a title shot for the Glory Middleweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 GLORY 26 Amsterdam
programme.desc: This event featured world title fight for the Glory Middleweight Championship between Artem Levin and Simon Marcus as headliner. Also this event featured 4-Man Middleweight Contender Tournament to earn a title shot for the Glory Middleweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E10 GLORY COLLISION 6
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E74 K1 WGP Tokyo FINAL 2006
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion for 2006.

programme.desc: Vladimir Zenin posts an incredible record, but Nick Agallar is ready for him. Battle hardened from serving in Iraq, this Milwakee brawler will have to be ready for whatever the Red Devil can throw his way. One of the most experienced fighters in the series, Nick Thompson has the scars to prove it. Ansar Chalangov will be looking to come out hard for the Russians. Tara LaRosa solidified her reputation as one of the top female fighters in Mixed Martial Arts in Series 1.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Kaream Ellington is home when he's walking the mean streets of The Bronx or ducking into the gym to train in muay-thai, wrestling and jiu-jitsu. Patt earned an MBA, while still hitting the gym 6 days a week. This fight is about formal training versus the lessons of the street.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK31 - Episode 1
programme.desc: The School of Hard Knocks 31 filmed at the Spectra Place in Estevan. Professional and Amateur fighters from across North America battle it out in the cage. Ethan Cornect vs. Andy Jack; David "Red Beard" Swanson vs. Chris Chapman [title fight].

programme.title: Archive Episodes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E115 Archive Episodes
programme.desc: Two exciting matches take place at HK48. First, Jess Elverum steps in to the cage against Jenn Wolstenholme in a female Bantamweight bout. Then see if Cody Wilson can strip the title belt from HK champ Sergej ""Leglock"" Juskevic.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Peter Arbeau brings strong Muay Thai influences to his MMA matches. After travelling the world over constantly seeing out new training and competition experiences, Peter is more than re//ady for his next fight at HK37. This is an intense bout against an equally skilled Matt Krayco, with fists and legs flying.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Brandt Dewsberry came to MMA in an effort to learn to cope with his anger and selfishness. At HK34, in a match against Sergej Juskevic, he has to channel all of his new found skills to come out on top.

programme.title: INDIVIDUAL FIGHTS

programme.desc: Martyn Harris v. Barry Ryan

programme.title: UCMMA 44 - Barry Ryan v. Oliver Sines
programme.desc: Barry Ryan v. Oliver Sines

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Ken Sumner as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 Undercover Love S1 E174
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Gangaa S1 E12
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E87 Mehek S2 E87
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 Dholi Beats S1 E174
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 King of Hearts S1 E174
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 Second Chances S1 E174
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E28 Jodha Akbar S2 E28
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 This is Fate S1 E174
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 Trinayani S1 E174
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.sub-title: S01 : E174 The Good Son S1 E174
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E28 Jodha Akbar S2 E28
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.sub-title: S01 : E175 The Good Son S1 E175
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E175 Undercover Love S1 E175
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Gangaa S1 E13
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E88 Mehek S2 E88
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E175 Dholi Beats S1 E175
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: A brave officer Arjun is shattered when his beloved dies in a terrorist attack and he's left paralysed. Arjun rises to the occasion, but can he avert the disaster?

programme.title: Manikarnika-The Queen of Jhansi
programme.desc: Manikarnika, known as Laxmibai after her marriage to the King of Jhansi, became a legendary figure in the 1857 revolt against the British. Renowned for her indomitable spirit and warrior skills, she fiercely battled the British, inspiring generations with her valour and dedication to her people until her end.

programme.title: Z Nation
